function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of dedicated Covid-19 patient hospital infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Establish dedicated Covid-19 patient facilities with proper infrastructure","Technologies":"Medical-grade air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in patient rooms","Impact":"Higher concentration of airborne contaminants, leading to increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade ventilation systems, increase air exchange rates, use high-efficiency air filters","Technologies":"Ventilation system upgrades, HEPA filters","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Insufficient air-cleaning routes in the airborne infectious-disease zone","Impact":"Ineffective containment of airborne infectious particles","Mitigation":"Establish effective air-cleaning routes, install air purifiers, use UV germicidal irradiation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
